title: Gluten free fluffy pancakes
ingredients: ['415ml milk', '60ml vinegar', '270g gluten free plain white flour', '50g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons (gluten free) baking powder', '1 1/4 teaspoons xanthan gum', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs, beaten', '55g butter, melted']
